item0.name: Ruby Crystal
item0.description: 150 Health

item1.name: Phage
item1.description:
15 Attack Damage
200 Health
  • Sturdy: After you deal physical damage to a champion, restore 2% max Health over 6 seconds.

    Restoration reduced to 50% for Ranged users.

item2.name: Titanic Hydra
item2.description:
30 Attack Damage
500 Health
  • Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 1% max Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health) physical damage to enemies behind the target.

    Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.

item3.name: Doran's Shield
item3.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item4.name: Plated Steelcaps
item4.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item5.name: Sunfire Aegis
item5.description:
350 Health
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 100% against monsters) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).
  • Flametouch: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Tenacity and Slow Resist.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item1.name: Boots of Swiftness
item1.description:
60 Move Speed
  • The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by 25%.

item2.name: Runesteel Spaulders
item2.description:
6 Attack Damage
100 Health
50% Base Health Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
  • Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below 0% of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 0 seconds (Max 0 charges).
  • Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Pauldrons of Whiterock.

    This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item3.name: Winged Moonplate
item3.description:
150 Health
  • Flight: Grants 5% Move Speed.

item4.name: Chain Vest
item4.description: 40 Armor

item5.name: Ruby Crystal
item5.description: 150 Health

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Phase Rush
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

    This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item1.name: Mercury's Treads
item1.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item2.name: Bami's Cinder
item2.description:
300 Health
  • Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (15 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 25% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

item3.name: Cloth Armor
item3.description: 15 Armor

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Aftershock
perk0.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
perk0.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)

item0.name: Turbo Chemtank
item0.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item1.name: Stridebreaker
item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (75% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 40%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Chain Vest
item2.description: 40 Armor

item3.name: Blade of The Ruined King
item3.description:
40 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
10% Life Steal
  • Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage On-Hit equal to (10% for Melee users | 6% for Ranged users) of the target's current Health.
  • Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 - 150 (based on level) magic damage and steals 25% Move Speed for 2 seconds (20s cooldown).

    Maximum Mist's Edge damage dealt to monsters and minions is 60.
    Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

item4.name: Doran's Blade
item4.description:

20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

item2.name: Dead Man's Plate
item2.description:
400 Health
40 Armor
5% Move Speed
  • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 60 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 100 magic damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

    ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

item3.name: Control Ward

item5.description:
350 Health
60 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (10 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item1.name: Randuin's Omen
item1.description:
250 Health
80 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active: Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

item2.name: Winged Moonplate
item2.description:
150 Health
  • Flight: Grants 5% Move Speed.

item3.name: Plated Steelcaps
item3.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item4.name: Negatron Cloak
item4.description: 50 Magic Resist

item5.name: Ruby Crystal
item5.description: 150 Health

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Dead Man's Plate
item0.description:
400 Health
40 Armor
5% Move Speed
  • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 60 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 100 magic damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

    ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

item1.name: Bami's Cinder
item1.description:
300 Health
  • Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (15 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 25% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

item2.name: Boots of Swiftness
item2.description:
60 Move Speed
  • The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by 25%.

item3.name: Doran's Shield
item3.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Phase Rush
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

15 Attack Damage
250 Health
100% Base Health Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item3.name: Thornmail
item3.description:
350 Health
60 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (10 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item4.name: Aegis of the Legion

30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste

item5.name: Control Ward

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item1.description:
40 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
10% Life Steal
  • Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage On-Hit equal to (10% for Melee users | 6% for Ranged users) of the target's current Health.

    Maximum Mist's Edge damage dealt to monsters and minions is 60.
    Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

40 Armor
5% Move Speed
  • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 60 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 100 magic damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

    ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

item2.name: Winged Moonplate
item2.description:
150 Health
  • Flight: Grants 5% Move Speed.

item3.name: Plated Steelcaps
item3.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item4.name: Negatron Cloak
item4.description: 50 Magic Resist

item5.name: Bramble Vest
item5.description:
35 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (3 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Stridebreaker
item0.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (75% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 40%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Phage
item2.description:
15 Attack Damage
200 Health
  • Sturdy: After you deal physical damage to a champion, restore 2% max Health over 6 seconds.

    Restoration reduced to 50% for Ranged users.

item3.name: Pickaxe
item3.description: 25 Attack Damage

item4.name: Plated Steelcaps
item4.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item5.name: Broken Stopwatch
item5.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Pickaxe
item2.description: 25 Attack Damage

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item4.name: Force of Nature
item4.description:
350 Health
60 Magic Resist
5% Move Speed
  • Absorb: Taking damage from Abilities grants you 8 Move Speed and 4 Magic Resist for 5 seconds (stacks up to 5 times; each unique Ability instance can give one stack).

item5.name: Winged Moonplate
item5.description:
150 Health
  • Flight: Grants 5% Move Speed.

item0.name: Turbo Chemtank
item0.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item1.name: Randuin's Omen
item1.description:
250 Health
80 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active: Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.
